title: Unicorns on the Hunt
body:
Unicorns take out Fnactic. Such an exciting game!!!

On a side note, teams are (finally) figuring out that SK lacks vision.

EDIT: I Did Mean SK! Leaving it in for the LOLs

replies.body: Gotta watch out for those Unicorn attacks, they are quite deadly.
I think you meant Unicorns take out SK Gaming. Fnatic played against Giants today.
